comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: ah the lead class of the "wobbly eight". She fulfilled her design requirements but ship design advanced very rapidly and within a few years she was obsolete with the advent of Dreadnought. She was lost to a mine in 1916, with only one man lost, falling between her and the rescue ship. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMS_King_Edward_VII
